last_episode_to_air.name: Fallen Idol
last_episode_to_air.overview: Hansie Cronje captivates South Africa as the nation's charismatic cricket captain, but allegations of match fixing besmirch his sterling reputation.

name: Bad Sport
overview: True crime and sports come together in this docuseries. Global controversies and scandals are explored through reports from those involved.

episodes.name: Hoop Schemes
episodes.overview: A gambler and players involved in a 1994 Arizona State basketball point-shaving scandal describe how and why they plotted to fix games for a payoff.

episodes.name: Need for Weed
episodes.overview: Hippie and small-time pot dealer Randy Lanier funds his passion for auto racing by taking his weed racket to new heights.

episodes.name: Footballgate
episodes.overview: Investigators detail shocking allegations that former Juventus director Luciano Moggi influenced referees in a scandal that rocked Italian football.

episodes.name: Gold War
episodes.overview: Controversy erupts at the 2002 Winter Olympics when a figure skating judge is allegedly pressured to rank Russia over Canada in the pairs competition.

episodes.name: Horse Hitman
episodes.overview: Tommy Burns looks back with regret at his disturbing days of killing show horses as part of an insurance fraud scheme concocted by wealthy owners.

episodes.name: Fallen Idol
episodes.overview: Hansie Cronje captivates South Africa as the nation's charismatic cricket captain, but allegations of match fixing besmirch his sterling reputation.
